{"id":968178799,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1686411981,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"17 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/968178799/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Movement of Robots","memory":"54.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n     long MOD = (long) 1e9 + 7;\n    public int sumDistance(int[] nums, String s, int d) {\n        int n = s.length();\n        long distance = 0;\n        long ans = 0;\n        char[] sChars = s.toCharArray();\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (sChars[i] == 'R') {\n                nums[i] += d;\n            } else if (sChars[i] == 'L') {\n                nums[i] -= d;\n            }\n        }\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        for (long i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            ans += (long) nums[(int) i] * i - distance;\n            ans %= MOD;\n            distance += nums[(int) i];\n            distance %= MOD;\n        }\n        return (int) (ans % MOD);\n    \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"movement-of-robots","has_notes":false}
